Intelligence Language Bonus: +2 Language Count
Rogue Skills: Skill Trained (Stealth; Choose 9 from any)
Scoundrel: Skill Trained (Deception; Diplomacy)
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 1 from any)
Charming Liar: Critical success on a Lie improves attitude by 1 step 1/conversation
Confabulator: Reduces bonus given to target of Deception for previous attempts to +1
Cooperative Nature: +4 Aid checks
Lengthy Diversion: May remain hidden after a Create a Diversion attempt critically succeeds
Lie To Me: May use Deception to detect lies in a conversation
Quick Disguise: May create a disguise in 1 min
Slippery Secrets: Deception vs. spell DC negates spell effects that read minds, detect lies, or reveal alignment
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Trap Finder: +1 AC vs. traps
Combat
Hit Points: 24 Armor Class: 16 (dexterity; trained) Class DC: Rogue: 16 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: None Shield: None
Combat Notes:
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Strength Attack Adjustment: +2
Scoundrel: A successful Feint inflicts flat-footed on foe vs. self attacks (critical success all attacks) for until the end of next turn
Sneak Attack: +1d6 HP damage vs. flat-footed foe with agile, finesse, or ranged weapons
Surprise Attack: May use Deception or Stealth for initiative to inflict flat-footed on creatures that haven't acted
Trap Finder: +1 Perception and automatic Search to find traps/May disable traps that require master in Thievery
Save: Fortitude: +4 (constitution; trained); Reflex: +8 (dexterity; expert); Will: +7 (wisdom; expert)
Save Notes: Trap Finder: +1 vs. traps
